title: dru tOm nanana (grahabhEda priyA tillAnA)
sahitya:
(rAgA:  gurupriyA)   
  dru tOm nanana tOm nanana tOm nanana dhinnA drudhinnA dru dhinnA dru tOm udana tana


anupallavi

  tattari dittar tOm tAri namtAri ujhaNu tajhaNu kijhaNu sa ni dha ma ga ri sa
sa ri ga mA hrdayamuna nilipinaTTi mA sadgurupriyamaina tillAna
(rAg  rasikapriyA)			


caraNam 1     tattAhakurE jaNurE ga ma diru taka tOm dir taka tOm dir taka tOm 
sa rI ga ma pa muraLI gAna rasikapriyamaina tillAna
				(gAyakapriyA)
    caraNam 2    takiTa takundari takiTa dhimita takiTa kukundari tA kiTataka tOm sa* nI* kiTataka tAm dha pA taka
tanOm kiTataka tanOm taka sa ri ga ma pa dha ni sariyaina gAyakapriyamaina tillAna
    caraNam 3  				(rAgA:  sunAdapriyA)Aa:S R2 G2 M2 P S  Av:  S N3 D1 P M2 G2 R2 S  takundari tAha tari dhImta takiTadhImta takiTa tadingiNata tAhakujham tarita 
pA nI sA* rI* rI* sakala niSkaLankamaina sunAdapriyamaina tillAna
    caraNam 4  				(rAgA:  kharaharapriyA)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G2 R2 S  takiTa tAm takiTa dru dru tOm dru dru tOm dirikiNAm tana tanana tillillAna tillillAna
priyamaina gatibhEda panca rAgamulalO racitamai kharaharapriyamaina tillAna
				(repeat anupallavi, then pallavi)
